p: In order to gain relevant data on cytotoxicity concentration range of thyme essential oil, it was necessary that in vitro testing was involved. Until now, no study had been conducted testing antiproliferative activity of thyme essential oil on lung carcinoma cell line H460 and acute lymphoblastic leukemia cell line MOLT-4. Our research contributes mainly to defining the IC 50 values of tested essential oil for listed cell lines.
